Mostly clear PERIOD Low near 35F PERIOD Winds light and variable PERIOD

Updated November     pm



Sometimes people will say young folks arent into the blues but when we play .. PERIOD they seem to dig it said Ryan LeCount graduate student in the College of Liberal Arts PERIOD

LeCount is the bass player for Crash Landing who will be playing at  tonight at the Purdue Memorial Summer Concert Series the series that provides free concerts for residents is on its last show for the summer PERIOD

Margie Jones project manager of the programs and recreation department of Purdue Memorial Union said Crash Landing is a blues band out of Lafayette that have performed locally frequently. other members and instruments of the band include Brian Chinino drums Joe Rock blues harp guitar and vocals and Todd Miller guitar and lead vocals PERIOD

LeCount described their music as a bluesoriented rock n roll. as of Monday LeCount said the plan of the band is to play the typical blue standards and modern oldChicago blues like Muddy Waters Steve Ray and some older rock n roll  Rolling Stones  type of music PERIOD The band is excited to play some new music they have been working on for the audience at the concert series PERIOD

LeCount said The stuff we do is really upbeat and wed like to have anyone who is into blues there. jones said since there is a chance of rain this week the rain location will be in the South Ballroom of the Union PERIOD Check the purdue.edupmu to see if the location has changed PERIOD

To listen to Crash Landing visit crashlandingblues.com PERIOD
